headline: GoDaddy Airo Site Designer: A quick chat can create a live WordPress site in minutes
summary: Bringing a business online with WordPress just got a lot easier and faster for small businesses everywhere. Today marks GoDaddy's (NYSE: GDDY) global rollout of GoDaddy Airo® Site Designer, a new AI-powered website builder that reimagines what it means to build a WordPress website.
